snippet: Jeffrey Milstein, 70, takes photographs of airplanes taking off, and of airports and other transportation hubs from the sky.
abstract: Photographer Jeffrey Milstein has made career of capturing images of airports and other transportation hubs from sky, shooting through open windows and doors of chartered planes and helicopters.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Milstein, 70, takes photographs of airplanes taking off, and of airports and other transportation hubs from the sky.

headline.seo: What Airports and Other Transportation Hubs Look Like From the Sky
